page.title: 02HOME AIDS
page.content: {IN THE KITCHEN} A COOKER, MICROWAVE, FRIDGE, FREEZER, WASHING MACHINE, TUMBLE DRYER, DISH WASHER, FOOD MIXER, FOOD BLENDER, SODA STREAM, TOASTER, FOOD MINCER, DEEP FAT FRYER, FIRE EXTINGUISHER, SANDWICH MAKER, ELECTRIC IRON. {REST OF THE HOUSE} VACUUM CLEANER, TELEVISION, RADIO, RECORD PLAYER, TAPE RECORDER, VIDEO RECORD, COMPUTER, ELECTRIC ORGAN, ELECTRIC FIRE, GAS FIRE, CENTRAL HEATING, ELETRIC BLANKET. {GARDEN} LAWN MOWER, HEDGE TRIMMER, STRIMMER. {TOOL SHED} ELECTRIC DRILL, SAW, SANDER {BEDROOM} HEATED ROLLERS, HAIR DRYER,
